abstract: Federal Reserve cites confidence in its plan to gradually increase benchmark interest rate while maintaining job growth; statement issued after meeting of Fed's policy-making committee expresses worry about weak global growth and shaky financial markets, but reaffirms commitment to plan.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve, which raised its benchmark interest rate last month for the first time in years, acknowledged weak global growth but said it still expected to increase rates.

headline.main: A January Pause, but Fed Affirms Plan for Gradual Rate Increases
headline.print_headline: A January Pause, but the Fed Affirms Its Plan for Gradual Rate Increases

snippet: The Federal Reserve, which raised its benchmark interest rate last month for the first time in years, acknowledged weak global growth but said it still expected to increase rates.

keywords.value: Federal Reserve Bank of New York
